meanings.sent1: The groundbreaking technology revolutionized the industry.
meanings.sent2: The team's groundbreaking approach led to a successful outcome.
meanings.sent3: The groundbreaking idea to use paperclips as bookmarks was surprisingly effective.
meanings.sent4: Her groundbreaking research opened up new possibilities in the field.
meanings.sent5: The groundbreaking design captured everyone's attention at the exhibition.

meanings.definition: A new and exciting development or discovery
meanings.sent1: The groundbreaking in medicine saved many lives.
meanings.sent2: The company's groundbreaking was covered in the news.
meanings.sent3: The groundbreaking of the new playground brought joy to the children.
meanings.sent4: The groundbreaking in technology changed the way we communicate.
meanings.sent5: The groundbreaking of the new store attracted a lot of customers.
